Application.Name: Camtasia Studio
Application.Comment: With Camtasia Studio, you can record your PC screen and create professional-looking videos that clearly demonstrate a process, a product, or an idea.

Application.Name: FullShot
Application.Comment: FullShot is a professional screen capture (print screen) application designed for any Windows user who needs an effortless, effective way to take screenshots of Windows screens.

Application.Name: SnagIt
Application.Comment: Snagit is the only screen shot utility available with five different capture modes and over 40 different ways to copy text, videos, images and websites content from your screen.

Application.Name: SSW Diagnostics
Application.Comment: Run this application weekly to avoid using out-dated software

Application.Name: SSW SQL Deploy
Application.Comment: SQL Deploy solves this problem by automatically performing Database updates as a part of your application deployment.

Application.Name: SSW Code Auditor
Application.Comment: For developer, install this to analyse your code. You may also need to run this to pass the TEST PLEASE

Application.Name: SSW Link Auditor
Application.Comment: Install this to analyse your website, it will tell you any broken links found

Application.Name: SSW SQL Auditor
Application.Comment: For developer, install this to analyse your database schema. You may also need to run this to pass the TEST PLEASE

Application.Name: SSW Time PRO .NET
Application.Comment: IMPORTANT!!! Every developer needs to enter their timesheet through this application every week
